content:
The Miller Family; Dedication


This site is dedicated to the memory of the seven hundred and ninety-three known family members that perished during the Holocaust.
1939 - 1945



This list is ordered by family, within the three main branches of the Avrohm Aba Miller tree. A notation at the end of each family indicates the total number of those that perished in the Holocaust (PIH).


The Yakov Mylech Miller branch: (Total known PIH = 151+)

    Family of Breindel Miller and Mordcha Dovid Reiss: (Total known PIH = 54+)

  • Bayla, along with her husband Avrohm Goldberg and two of their daughters; Esther & Breindle. (4 PIH)
  • Yosef Hersh, along with his wife, Sarah Wald, their nine children, all married, with their families.(Total: 22+ PIH)
    • Blima, married with children. Names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Menachem Mendel, married to Malka Reiss, along with two of their sons; Yissochur Tovia & Meir Avrohm. (4 PIH)
    • Rivka, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Rochel, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Shlome, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Malka, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Naftuli, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Shaindle, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Mordcha Dovid, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
  • Yeshaya, along with his wife, Dreizel Hoflich, their nine children, all married, with their families.(Total: 18+ PIH)
    • Chaya Sarah, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Michael, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Breindle, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Yehudis, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Esther, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Avrohm/Aron Moshe, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Hena, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Mordcha Dovid, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
  • Yakov Mylech, along with his wife, Sima, their four children, all married, with their families.(Total: 10+ PIH)
    • Breindle, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Pesel, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Avrohm Leib, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Menachem Mendel, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)

    Family of Sarah Rochel Miller and Hersh Leib Farber: (Total known PIH = 39+)

  • Breindle, along with her husband, a Margolis, and two of their sons, both married, with their families.(Total: 6+ PIH)
    • Jack, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Avrohm, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
  • Chana Blima Farber and six of her children, all married, with their families.(Total: 13+ PIH)
    • Sarah Rochel, married to a Korman, with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Mindle, married to her cousin, Mordcha Ofner.(1 PIH [he is counted later])
    • Yussel, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Edis, married to an Ofner, with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Henya, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Ruzsha, married with no children. Husband unknown.(2 PIH)
  • Yakov, along with his wife and their two daughters.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Malkie Follman, along with her married son from her first marriage.(Total: 6 PIH)
    • Dovid Reicher, married to Pesel Schaffer, with three of their children; Claire, Shari, & Helen.(5 PIH)
  • Gittel, along with her husband, Mordcha Ofner, and four children, all married with families.(Total: 10+ PIH)
    • boy, married to Edis Farber, with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Sally, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Chayka, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • boy, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)

    Family of Avrohm Aba Miller and Miriam Miller: (Total known PIH = 28)

  • Chaim Reuven, along with his wife Sura Gittel are fate unknown. Two of their children did perish; Chava & Shmuel.(Total: 2 PIH)
  • Feiga Kendel, along with her husband, Moshe Stern, and three of their children; Helen, Maylech Dovid, & Yashea.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Itcha, along with his wife, Rudja, and their three children; Kopel, Hena, & Zelda.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Sender, along with his wife, Leah, and two of their children; Shimon, & Yechiel.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Ahron Dovid, along with his second wife, Gittel Hochberger, and the five children from his two marriages; Shaindel, Avrohm Aba, Chana, Shimon, & child.(Total: 7 PIH)
  • Yehuda Meyer, along with his wife, Frimtcha.(Total: 2 PIH)
  • Leah died in 1928. Her husband, Shaul Widawski, and two of their children, perished; Sarah, & Henny.(Total: 3 PIH)

    Family of Yitzchok Zev Miller and Yocheved Miller: (Total known PIH = 13)

  • Shabsi, along with his wife Chaya Sarah Leiber, and three of their children; Mirel, Alta Hadassah, & Leah.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Avrohm Abba survived but his first wife, Shaindle, perished.(Total: 1 PIH)
  • Leibish, married with children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Roiza, along with her husband Chaim Miller, and three of their children; Yechezkel?, boy, & child.(Total: 5 PIH)

The Pesach Dovid Miller branch: (Total known PIH = 441+)

    Family of Avrohm Aba Miller and Breindel Zimmermann: (Total known PIH = 29+)

  • Pesach Dovid and his wife Sara Schonfeld were in the US before the war. Two of their children with their families (& Pesach's mother, Breindel) perished.(Total: 8+ PIH)
    • Freitchu, married to Levi Yitzchok Goldstein, with their two children; Shlomo & Chaya.(4 PIH)
    • Shabsy, married to Ilonka Schwartz, with children; names unknown.(3+ PIH)
  • Sarah, along with her husband Yakov Noach, and five of their children.(Total: 9 PIH)
    • Herschel. His family survived.(1 PIH)
    • Leah, married to Chananel Friedman, with their two children; names unknown.(4 PIH)
    • Rivka. She was not married.(1 PIH)
    • Avrohm Aba. He was not married.(1 PIH)
  • Hinda, along with her husband Shaya (Yeshaya Leib) Schwartz, and four of their children.(Total: 7 PIH)
    • Sarah Velke, married, children unknown.(2 PIH)
    • Myer?. He was not married.(1 PIH)
    • Perel. She was not married.(1 PIH)
    • girl. She was not married.(1 PIH)
  • Mordche died before the Holocaust. His wife, Bayla Reichman, and their four children, perished; Mendel, Abala, Herschel, & Shulamis(Total: 5 PIH)

    Family of girl and a Zevasser?: (Total known PIH = 11+)

  • Esther along with her husband Noach Pfeffer and two of their children; Leah & Roiza.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Chana Rita along with her husband Henich Weiss and their two daughters; names unknown.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Itcha along with his wife and their one son; names unknown.(Total: 3 PIH)

    Family of Rivka Miller and Roita Ber (Dov/Ber) Schermer: (Total known PIH = 4)

  • Moshe Dovid Schermer.(Total: 1 PIH)
  • Basha, along with her husband, a Landau, and their one son; Yosef.(Total: 3 PIH)

    Family of Yakov Hersh Miller and Taube Lerer: (Total known PIH = 29+)

  • Miriam, along with her husband, Yosef Balkan, and their two sons; Pinchus & Shabsy.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Pinchus, along with his wife Chava, and their five children; Yakov Hersh, Avrohm, Sarah, Shoshana, & Yaffa.(Total: 7 PIH)
  • Sholom, along with his wife Raylah, and three of their children; Yechiel, Esther, & Chana.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Feiga Gittel, along with her husband Moshe Mordcha Igolnitzer, and three of their children; Shabsy, Yakov Hersh, & Esther.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Yosef and perhaps some of his children.(Total: 1+ PIH)
  • Tzlava, along with her husband Beirish Hirsch.(Total: 2 PIH)
  • Shlome, along with his wife Bayla, and their three children; Sarah, Yakov Hersh, & girl.(Total: 5 PIH)

    Family of Sholom Miller and Brucha Kanner: (Total known PIH = 38+)

  • Susha, along with her husband, Chaim Horowitz, and their five children, three of which were married with children.(Total: 10+ PIH)
    • Yehoshua, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Leibish, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Leah, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Hinda. She was not married.(1 PIH)
    • Sarah. She was not married.(1 PIH)
  • Pinchus Yosef, along with all the children from his first marriage, including a son in Germany, save one (Chaytchu). Their names are not known.(Total: 3+ PIH)
  • Avrohm, along with his wife, Shaindle Engel, and their five children.(Total: 9+ PIH)
    • Chana, married to Ori Breklach, with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Shabsy, married with children; names unknown.(2+ PIH)
    • Shea. He was not married.(1 PIH)
    • Moshe. He was not married.(1 PIH)
    • Yitzchok. He was not married.(1 PIH)
  • Yoel Moshe, along with his wife, Esther Layzer, and their eight children; Bracha, Toba, Chava, Sasha, girl, girl, girl, & boy.(Total: 10 PIH)
  • Shea, along with his wife, Yitta Miller, and their four children; child, child, child, & child.(Total: 6 PIH)

    Family of Avrohm Miller, married first to Pushka Werner and later to Gittel Scheindlin: (Total known PIH = 27+)

  • Chana was married to Chaim Schnur, with 15 children. Very little is known about them. At least six of their children and five grandchildren perished in the Holocaust; names unknown.(Total: 11+ PIH)
  • Batya was married to Meir Steinbok. She is known to have perished in the Holocaust.(Total: 1 PIH)
  • Golda, along with her husband Leibleh Scharf, and their two married children.(Total: 10 PIH)
    • Chana, married to a Blumenkranz, with two children; names unknown.(4 PIH)
    • Berel, married with two children; names unknown (a boy & a girl).(4 PIH)
  • Esther, along with her husband Yakov Yitzchok Spanglet, and their two children, names unknown.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Shmuel.(Total: 1 PIH)

    Family of Yocheved Miller and Moshe haLevi Rebhun: (Total known PIH = 35+)

  • Pesach Dovid, along with his wife, Malka Stern, their daughter & daughter-in-law, both married with children, & one granddaughter.(Total: 10 PIH)
    • Esther, married to Moshe Klagsbald, with children; Yocheved Mirel & Faiga.(4 PIH)
    • Yankel married Toba Schwimmer. She perished, along with their two children; Yitzchok Isaac & Moshe.(3 PIH)
    • Herschel married Idja Yeret. Their middle daughter perished; Yocheved Mirel.(1 PIH)
  • Pinchus had one daughter that perished in the Holocaust; Mirel.(Total: 1 PIH)
  • Yankel, along with his wife, a Weinberg, and their children, the oldest daughter being married (to Pinchus Laufer); boy, Avrohm, Mirel Laufer, & boy.(Total: 7 PIH)
  • Esther, along with her husband, Shimon Kvadwratd, and their five children; girl, Yocheved Mirel, girl, girl, & boy.(Total: 7 PIH)
  • Shabsi, along with his wife, Rivka Rochel, the daughter of the Ruv of Bukowsko, and their children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Mordcha, along with his wife, Feiga Friedman, and their son; Moshe.(Total: 3 PIH)

    Family of Basha Miller and R. Leibleh Rokeach: (Total known PIH = 41+). Note: Only one daughter, Baila, with her husband & one son survived. The entire remainder of this branch perished.

  • Malka, along with her husband, R. Naftali Tzvi Herzog, and their four children, the oldest two married.(Total: 8 PIH)
    • R. Shabsi Yitzchok, married to Baila Rubin.(2 PIH)
    • Chaim Yehoshua, married; name unknown.(2 PIH)
    • Devorah, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Sholom, not married.(1 PIH)
  • Baila's two oldest sons, with their wives, perished. Her husband, R. Avrohm Tzvi Horowitz, and one of their sons, R. Sholom, were the sole survivors of the Holocaust from the Rokeach branch of our family.(Total: 4 PIH)
    • R. Moshe, married to Malka Horowitz.(2 PIH)
    • R. Chaim Yosef, married to Rachel Eisenstein.(2 PIH)
  • Moshe, along with his wife and all their children. Only the name of one son is known. (Total: 4+ PIH)
    • Reuven, married to a Maryles; children unknown.(2+ PIH)
  • Pesach Dovid, along with his wife, a Lesser, and all their children. There was an oldest girl, then Esther, then the others. Their names are not known. (Total: 4+ PIH)
  • Yocheved Mirel, along with her second husband, R. Yisochor Dov Dershowitz, and her married son from her first marriage.(Total: 4 PIH)
    • R. Avrohm, married to a Lipshitz.(2 PIH)
  • Shabsi Yitzchok, along with his wife, name unknown, and their four children;Sholom, Shea, boy, & one other.(Total: 6 PIH)
  • Yehoshua, along with his wife and their children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Rivka, along with her husband, Chaim Dovid Parnes, and their seven children; Rohchil and six others, names unknown.(Total: 9 PIH)

    Family of Pinchus Miller and Tobtcha Weinberg: (Total known PIH = 16+)

  • Shabsy, along with his wife, Marmtcha Kahan, and their four children; Hantsha, Heshy, Raizel, Levi.(Total: 6 PIH)
  • Esther, along with her husband, Chaim Zeisswein, and their one child; name unknown.(Total: 3 PIH)
  • Chaskel, along with his wife, Pesel Leiblech, and their one child; name unknown.(Total: 3 PIH)
  • Lipshe (married named Nussbaum), along with all her children; names unknown.(Total: 1+ PIH)
  • Shlome, along with his wife, Blima Schnitzer, and all their children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Pesach Dovid(Total: 1 PIH)

    Family of Pesach Dovid Miller and Sarah Hinda Baron: (Total known PIH = 11+)

  • Layza, along with his wife, Ida Lesser, and seven of their eight their children; Perel, Chaya Sarah, Nechama, Rivka, Leibish Gershon, Avrohm Dovid, and Chaim Sholom.(Total: 9 PIH)
  • Birtchu, along with his wife, Chavtcha Stern, and children; names unknown. (Total: 2+ PIH)

    Family of Miriam Malka Miller and Yosef Zak: (Total known PIH = 5+)

  • Dvorah, along with her husband, Moshe Shapiro and their two children; Yitzchok Yeruchom Fishel & Toba. (Total: 4 PIH)
  • Bayla Chaya was taken away to Germany during the war. She may have married before she perished.(Total: 1+ PIH)

    Family of Avrohm Aba Diamant and Faiga Rochel Baruch: (Total known PIH = 7)

  • Nusson, along with his second wife, Shifra Rohchel Goldberger, and three of his children.(Total: 6 PIH)
    • Yitzchok Isaac, married to Tzurty Bloom.(2 PIH)
    • Moshe Meir, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Sarah Leah, not married.(1 PIH)

    Family of Chaskel Miller and Multsha Miller: (Total known PIH = 17+)

  • Eilish, along with his wife. They had no children.(Total: 2 PIH)
  • Mylech, married with children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Avrohm, married with children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Fannie, along with her husband, Herschel Frank, and one of their children; Shoni.(Total: 3 PIH)
  • Shaul, married with children; names unknown.(Total: 2+ PIH)
  • Rochel, along with her husband, R. Nuta Shlomo Schlissel, and four of their children; Chaya, Malka, Yechezkel, & Chaim Eliezer.(Total: 6 PIH)

    Family of Avrohm Aba Miller and Hena Treitle: (Total known PIH = 52)

  • Moshe, along with his wife, Sarah Freidle Schermer, and seven of their children.(Total: 9 PIH)
    • Lytchu, who was engaged at the time.(1 PIH)
    • Yossi, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Chaytchu, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Meir, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Duved, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Rivkele, not married.(1 PIH)
    • Feiga, not married.(1 PIH)
  • Duvtcha Miller, along with his wife, Chaytchu, and three of their children; Yossi, Shabse, & Chazkush.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Chana Rita, along with her husband, R. Shiye Langer, and five of their children; Mordcha Dovid, Blima, Mylech, Mendel, & Esther Toiba.(Total: 7 PIH)
  • Eilah, along with his wife, Sara Teitelbaum, and their five children; Monya, Blimu, Toby, Chani?, & Abie.(Total: 7 PIH)
  • Gitttel Frankel.(Total: 1 PIH)
  • Breindle, along with her husband, Chaskel Moskowitz, and their four children; Yossi, Sarah, Blimu, & Moshe Aron.(Total: 6 PIH)
  • Basha, along with her husband, Sruel Meir Wolf, and their four children; Yossi, Suri, Faigy, & Abie.(Total: 6 PIH)
  • Chaim, along with his wife, Gittel Fried, and their four children; Blimu, Sarah, Malka, & Abie.(Total: 6 PIH)
  • Itcha and his wife survived. Three of their children perished; Avrohm Aba, Moshe, & Buni.(Total: 3 PIH)
  • Yechezkel, along with his wife, Shaindle Broyde.(Total: 2 PIH)

    Family of Levi Yitzchok Miller and Chay Gitsha: (Total known PIH = 22)

  • Chana, along with her husband, Zalman Massbaum, and all their children, except for one boy; Yosef, Aidel & Zisel.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Eila, along with his wife (a Bleich) and their 3 children; Mayer, girl & girl.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Dovid, along with his wife and their 3 young children.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Miriam, along with her husband, Bimyomin Gottleib, and their 3 very young children.(Total: 5 PIH)
  • Sala, along with her husband, Bimyomin Horowitz, and their infant daughter.(Total: 3 PIH)

    Family of Pesach Dovid Miller and Raizel Guwertmann: (Total known PIH = 23)

  • Tema Leah, along with her husband, Yosef Chaim Sander (Hoflich), and all their children; Ephraim, Chaya, Mordche Leib, Libu, Freidy, Rivka, & Naftuli Hersh.(Total: 9 PIH)
  • Chana Rita (married to Chaim Yosef Halberstam-Unger), along with two of her children; Moshe Elyukim Briah & Chaya.(Total: 3 PIH)
  • Chaskel, along with his wife, Mindel Eisenberg, and one of their children; Moshe.(Total: 3 PIH)
  • Mordcha Leib, along with his wife, Rivka Miller, and both of their children; Gittel & Pesach Dovid.(Total: 4 PIH)
  • Mendel, along with his wife, Esther Ring, and both of their children; Pesach Dovid & Moshe.(Total: 4 PIH)

    Family of R. Shmuel Aron Miller and Chava Vildstein: (Total known PIH = 25+)

  • Yoel, along with his wife, Pessil Leiber, and at least one of their children; Hersh. (Total: 3+ PIH)
  • Ben-Zion, along with his wife, Leah Lipschutz, and eleven of their children; Nuta, Shea, Moshe, Faiga, Rochel, Alta Chaya, & others. (Total: 13 PIH)
  • Sara Chula, along with her husband, Aba Wax, and five of their children; Yehoshua, Chana, Bracha, Chaya Rasha, & Shlomo Leib. (Total: 7 PIH)
  • Rochel Leah, along with her husband, Moshe Shea Reich. (Total: 2 PIH)

    Family of Nechuma Miller and Yitzchok Nuta Stengal: (Total known PIH = 10)

  • Sara Chivala, along with her husband, Yakov Volf Dym, and their three children; Roza, Dov, & Yechezkel. (Total: 5 PIH)
  • Boruch, along with his wife, Sarah Rivka, and both of their children; Naftali & Shaindel. (Total: 4 PIH)

    Family of R. Moshe'le Miller and Nechama Yuta Eisenberg: (Total known PIH = 8)

  • Dovid was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)

  • girl was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)
  • girl was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)
  • Chezkel was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)

  • Yitzchok was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)

  • Sara Chivala, along with her husband, an Eisen. (Total: 2 PIH)
  • Yankel was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)

  • Naftali was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)
  • Fraida was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)

    Family of Sarah Miller and R. Leibel Yugund: (Total known PIH = 6)

  • 5 or 6 children, none of whom were married. (Total: 7+ PIH)

    Family of Chaim Schonfeld and Malka Mandel. (Total known PIH = 2)

The Yisroel Yitzchok Miller branch: (Total known PIH = 202+)

    Family of Ozer Miller and ?: (Total known PIH = 0+)

  • Most of this family perished. I am still trying to find out more information regarding them.

    Family of Moshe Miller and Faigel Rappaport: (Total known PIH = 26)

  • Chezkel Shraga, along with his wife, Gittel Miller, and all their children; Avrohm, Moshe, & Esther. (Total: 5 PIH)
  • Esther, along with her husband, Chaskel Schrod, and all their five children; names unknown. (Total: 7 PIH)
  • Ahron, along with his wife and all their four children; names unknown. (Total: 6 PIH)
  • Ittle, along with her husband, a Raab, and all their five children; names unknown. (Total: 7 PIH)

    Family of Ettel Miller and Yankel Weissbloom: (Total known PIH = 0+)

    Family of Malka Leah Lauer and a Deutsch: (Total known PIH = 5)

  • Zeesel (who was married to Yeedle Klein), along with her eight children; names unknown. (Total: 9 PIH)
  • Shprintza, along with her husband, an Eisler/Fixler, and their three children; names unknown. (Total: 5 PIH)
  • Esther was not married. (Total: 1 PIH)

    Family of Tzila Lauer and a Landau. (Total known PIH = 2)

  • Etush, along with her husband, a Zimmerman or Reiss, and their three children; names unknown. (Total: 5 PIH)

    Family of Yulishka Lauer and Berti Fried: (Total known PIH = 2)

    • Fishel, along with his wife and their children; names unknown. (Total: 2+ PIH)

    • Sholom, along with his wife and their children; names unknown. (Total: 2+ PIH)
